2025-05-13.title: Samsung in Talks to Buy FläktGroup in $1.5 Billion-Plus Deal
2025-05-13.description: Samsung Electronics Co. is closing in on an agreement to buy FläktGroup Holding GmbH, acquiring the European heating and cooling specialist in its biggest overseas takeover in eight years.

2025-05-13.title: Do you want a skinny smartphone with worse battery life?
2025-05-13.description: Samsung's new Galaxy S25 Edge is 5.8 millimeters thick, compared to the S25's 7.2.

2025-05-15.title: NEO Battery Appoints Ex-Samsung Large-Scale Cell Expert, Dr. Jun Sik Jeoung, as Senior Scientific Advisor of Commercialization & Cell Development
2025-05-15.description: Appointed Dr. Jun Sik Jeoung as Senior Scientific Advisor of Commercialization & Cell Development Over 17 Years of Experience in Lithium-Ion Battery R&D, Scale-Up, and Production at Global Battery Cell Manufacturers & Automotive OEM At Samsung, Led BMW i3 EV …
